text: @JoeBiden Really? TRANSFORM THIS COUNTRY LIKE YOUR PUPPET MASTER OBAMA SAID BACK IN 2008? No thank you. I liked America the way it was before the Coronavirus. Guess that means Michelle Obama is your VP pick. Obama getting a 3rd term as you resign from dementia.  Sad!
